title: GPAC Tailgate #6 - USC v UCLA
desc: The Battle for Los Angeles comes home to the Coliseum!  Come prepare for the epic game with your friends from Price. This is the official tailgate event for all MPA, MPP, and MNPL students. Your ticket includes unlimited food and drinks under the GPAC tents (exact location to be announced the day of the event via the Facebook event). Kickoff time is at 12:30PM in the Coliseum. Come close out the tailgate season in style! Fight on!
